attributes.action: Theresa May should immediately declare no deal and walk away from the EU
attributes.additional_details: rather then pay the EU this money walk away and spend the money on NHS,SCHOOLS.HOUSING,POLICE,ARMED FORCES
attributes.background:
Reports last week suggested Mrs May could be considering paying Brussels’ demands for a £53billion (€60bn) sum to move things forward.
But the Prime Minister warned in October Britain was preparing for the possibility of a “no deal” scenario.
